descriptions.description: NEMO version: 3.4 LIM version: 2 Atmospheric Forcing: CGRF Runoff: Interannual Monthly with Greenland Melt Open Boundary Condition: GLORYS2V3 Initial Condition: GLORYS2V3 Output frequency: 5 days Others: Bamber et al. (2012) for Greenland runoff, 46% of discharge in liquid form, 54% in iceberg form; vertical mixing enhanced for runoff from 0 - 30 m; bergy bits set to 0.3; latent heat flux from icebergs included; vertically-integrated ocean forcing of icebergs (Merino et al., 2016); iceberg field initialized in equilibrium (used previous 2015 outputs as "initial condition").
